title: Calories in an 8 oz Sirloin Steak
meta_description: Discover calories in a 8oz sirloin steak, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per 100 g basis, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
h1: Calories in an 8 oz Sirloin Steak
assumptions: Lean top sirloin, trimmed of visible fat, broiled or grilled without added oil, marinade, or sauce; cooked to medium.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, fat content, cooking method, and source; values are averages. Check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: An 8 oz sirloin steak provides about 468 kcal and 70 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in an 8 oz sirloin steak?
faqs.a: Approximately 468 kcal for a lean, broiled 8 oz sirloin steak.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 8 oz sirloin steak?
Does cooking method affect calories in sirloin steak?
faqs.a: Yes—grilling keeps it lower; frying with oil adds 40+ kcal.
Negligible—0 g carbs, fiber, or sugars per serving.

faqs.q: How does fat trimming change calories in 8 oz sirloin?
faqs.a: Trimming reduces fat and calories by up to 50 kcal versus untrimmed.
